description:
Announcement announcement!
The #holoENCalendar is back for 2023!🥳

Join @TakanashiKiara -Claus and all the hololive English talents from December 1 onwards in the countdown towards Christmas with a new video at GMT+0 every day!

https://holoen-advent.com/

Use the hasthtag, spread the joy!🎄

------------------------------

Follow the talents!

▶Mori Calliope
 @MoriCalliope 
https://twitter.com/moricalliope

title: hololive English 2023 Christmas Advent Calendar Announcement #holoENCalendar
